name: God of Frenzy II (+ AREP final version)
name_original: God of Frenzy II (+ AREP final version)
description:
This is the demo map showcasing the newest version of the Alpha Reimagined Enemy Pack. Any newer versions of the enemy pack will be in the form of my upcoming "The Sequel" mod.

 - Enemies originally scrapped from the game, now make a comeback, with new mechanics.

 - 36 new enemy types, each with their own lore.

 - An enemy guide, to help you wrap your head around their mechanics.

 - And a demo map that showcases their potential.
